text: allāh vetin ovunṭa ek dharmayak pahaḷa viya. eya ovun veta æti dharmaya satyaya karada tabannēya. mīṭa pera nam, ovun pratikṣēpa karannan mata (tamanṭa) jayagrahaṇaya labā dena men (mema dharmayē mahimaya magin deviyan vahansē veta) prārthanā karamin siṭiyaha. namut ovun hon̆din dæna (pæmiṇēvi yayi balā) siṭi (mema dharmaya) ovun veta pæmiṇi avasthāvēdī, meya ovun pratikṣēpa karannāha. ebævin ema pratikṣēpa karannan mata allāhgē śāpaya at vēvā
